name: The Design System | Part 1 | Web
description:
Web UI kit | Design System of @tianmunooz

Part 1/3


After spending a few years designing interfaces, I have realized the need to have a design system, that is why I have created a series of files that collect atoms, molecules, decoration and in some cases, design organizations.


As time goes by I will upload more files to feed the design system so that your new designs have everything they need to be excellent, I hope you like it.
